projects.title: Aiden Jae
projects.description: A complete brand and e-commerce build for a fashion-focused client, blending minimalist identity design with a high-conversion Shopify storefront.
projects.challenge: The client needed to launch a modern brand with both strong visual identity and a functional e-commerce presence. The existing setup lacked cohesion and scalability.
projects.solution: We created a full-stack identity and Shopify build including logo, typography, and a custom Shopify theme with responsive UI and optimized checkout flow.
results: Seamless launch of brand and storefront
Improved customer engagement and sales readiness

projects.title: Altrueism
projects.description: A clean, accessible brand and user experience system created to communicate trust, clarity, and purpose across web and print touchpoints.
projects.challenge: Altrueism needed to stand apart in a competitive market with a brand system that balanced modern aesthetics with approachability.
projects.solution: We developed a timeless typographic system, color palette, and UX-driven layouts that reinforced clarity and trust. Deliverables included brand guidelines and responsive web designs.
results: Strong visual consistency across all platforms
Improved user trust through simplified UX

projects.title: Everyday Gold
projects.description: A full brand and e-commerce design for a luxury goods brand, combining refined aesthetics with a performant Shopify experience.
projects.challenge: The client required a unified brand presence and a Shopify storefront that communicated luxury while remaining user-friendly and scalable.
projects.solution: We crafted a brand system rooted in elegance and simplicity, then extended it into a responsive Shopify storefront with optimized navigation and product storytelling.
results: Elevated brand positioning in luxury segment
Strong foundation for scaling product lines
